title: Kanye, Racist Alabama, Sheryl Underwood, Coach Sanders and more.
itunes:title: Kanye, Racist Alabama, Sheryl Underwood, Coach Sanders and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today is truly Throwback Thursday because we have the Three Musketeers in the building. Today The CLO deals with an overprotective brother and private accounts. What is really up with Bennifer!? Clearly nothing has changed in Alabama. The vaccination fear continues. Today Sheryl Underwood poses a very important question. Coach Prime wants equal treatment or he out. West Coast rapper YG posted some artwork from his daughter on his IG. Today the show wraps up with talk about what may happen or really what may not happen in the Land of the Rising Sun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
